mapper.select: select ca.assessment_name as assessmentName from common_assessment as ca where ca.school_id = #{schoolId} and data_status = '2' group by ca.assessment_name

select ca.assessment_name as assessmentName from common_assessment as ca, common_assessment_scheme as cas where ca.school_id = #{schoolId} and ca.data_status = '2' and cas.scheme_details like CONCAT('%', #{softwareIdStr}, '%') and ca.assessment_scheme_id = cas.id group by ca.assessment_name

select count(ca.id) as totalNum from common_assessment as ca where (ca.start_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} or ca.end_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate})
and ca.id != #{id}

select * from common_assessment as ca where ca.assessment_name = #{assessmentName} and ca.start_date <= #{startDate} and ca.end_date >= #{startDate} and ca.data_status = #{dataStatus} and status = '0'
